itemListElement.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Cauliflower + Tips for Roasting Veggies

@graph.name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Cauliflower
@graph.description: Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Cauliflower with fresh herbs, black pepper. Roasted Veggies Bowl with rosemary, thyme, garlic, black pepper. Vegan Glutenfree Nutfree Soyfree Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2  head of cauliflower (, chopped into small/medium florets)
1  small zucchini (, sliced into 1/4 inch slices)
1 tsp dried thyme (or 1 tbsp fresh, chopped)
1/2 tsp freshly ground black pepper (, large flakes if possible)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 220 C). Chop the veggies and add to a bowl. (You can add more seasonal veggies such as sweet potatoes, butternut, fennel, kohlrabi etc. Add more salt, herbs, garlic, pepper depending on volume).
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 deg F ( 220 C). Chop the veggies and add to a bowl. (You can add more seasonal veggies such as sweet potatoes, butternut, fennel, kohlrabi etc. Add more salt, herbs, garlic, pepper depending on volume).

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil and toss well to coat. Add the salt, herbs and black pepper and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil and toss well to coat. Add the salt, herbs and black pepper and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a stoneware baking dish. Cover the dish with parchment and bake for 15 mins, Then remove parchment, move the veggies around and continue to bake for 20 to 25 mins or until the veggies are roasted and tender to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a stoneware baking dish. Cover the dish with parchment and bake for 15 mins, Then remove parchment, move the veggies around and continue to bake for 20 to 25 mins or until the veggies are roasted and tender to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven. Taste and adjust salt by sprinkling some more if needed. Add some more black pepper. Serve immediately with lemon juice, or this garlic sauce or this gravy. or as a side, or add to bowls.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from the oven. Taste and adjust salt by sprinkling some more if needed. Add some more black pepper. Serve immediately with lemon juice, or this garlic sauce or this gravy. or as a side, or add to bowls.
